response.original_title: Worlds 2024 - League of Legends World Championship
response.overview: The 2024 League of Legends World Championship is an ongoing esports tournament for the multiplayer online battle arena video game League of Legends. It is the fourteenth iteration of the League of Legends World Championship, an annual international tournament organised by the game's developer, Riot Games.
response.title: Worlds 2024 - League of Legends World Championship
